item.title: On-Camera Video Task - $70 - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who’s not camera shy to help with a quick video task. No video editing required!

Pay:
$70 for a short video task

Requirements:

Comfortable being on camera
Reliable and punctual

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 16, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Videography, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Digital Video, Camera, Acting, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Production, Videography, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Digital Video, Camera, Acting, Video Intro & Outro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Need someone to create a VSL (Video Sales Letter) - Upwork
item.description:
Need someone to create a high quality video explaining an offer we have. This will be on the front page of our website. Please respond with similar videos you have created and price. Video will be around 45 seconds to 1 minute and 30 seconds give or take. Thanks!


Posted On: June 16, 2024 18:17 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Commercial, English, Video Editing, Copywriting
Skills: Video Production, Video Commercial, English, Video Editing, Copywriting
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
